text: There's A Picture In My Old Kit Bag is a World War I song written and composed by Al Sweet. This song was first published in 1918 by Ted Browne Music Co., in Chicago IL..The sheet music cover depicts a soldier in a trench looking at a picture. The sheet music can be found at the Pritzker Military Museum & Library.Sweet, Albert C. 1918. There's a picture in my old kit bag. Chicago: Ted Browne Music Co. == References == == Bibliography == *Parker, Bernard S. World War I Sheet Music 1. Jefferson: McFarland & Company, Inc., 2007. . *Vogel, Frederick G. World War I Songs: A History and Dictionary of Popular American Patriotic Tunes, with Over 300 Complete Lyrics. Jefferson: McFarland & Company, Inc., 1995. . Category:1918 songs Category:Songs of World War I
title: There's A Picture In My Old Kit Bag
